snippet: Patriot Coal filed for bankruptcy protection on Monday, prompted by struggles with low coal prices. The company said that it had $3.6 billion in assets and $3.1 billion in debts.
abstract: Patriot Coal filed for bankruptcy protection on Monday, prompted by struggles with low coal prices. The company said that it had $3.6 billion in assets and $3.1 billion in debts.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Patriot Coal Files for Bankruptcy Protection
